name: Music Question Puzzles Game “ For AC DC ”
name_original: Music Question Puzzles Game “ For AC DC ”
description:
The super cool trivia that lets you play solo or compete against your friend to determine who has the best Fan.

Each of the categories is challenging and tests your knowledge. Get the high score in Game Center or against your friend!

FEATURES

--> More than 500+ Question contain in app.
--> Many Categories for your style and fun.
--> Randomly many question, You will hard to see the old question.
--> Combine wit and strategy
--> Share your leader boards
